location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Charles Pasley, Acting for Brigadier General John Malcolm at the Camp at Mohumrah, to Andrew Jukes Esq. at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Charles Pasley, Acting for Brigadier General John Malcolm at the Camp at Mohumrah [Mohammerah, Iran], to Andrew Jukes Esq. at Bushire, enclosing a list of articles sent to Sir Harford Jones, but which he had left at Bushire, and requesting them to be returned to Mohammerah by the first vessel available (list not attached).
